title: 47: Wineries in Los Gatos, CA
description:
Hello lovely listeners. Enjoying the table wine? Well why don't we take this back to our garden. We've got plenty of steamed salami to go around ;) Just don't let Louis out, we're happy he left his post at the winery for us. He just really loves when we take him on an exploration of awful reviews and the people who write them!


Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/beachtoosandy to fulfill our dream of chatting with you live on video. 

Buy our merch! https://store.dftba.com/collections/beach-too-sandy-water-too-wet


Logo by Courtney DeKorte. Theme by Mavus White.
Music by PSOVOD and tyops.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
